resources.string: WebView package not found, is it currently updating or removed?
Be aware that the DNS server you are connected to is able to record which sites you are visiting. Check the respective privacy statements for more information.

This app is open source. The source code can be accessed at nebulo.app/source. Furthermore the app doesn't contain ads and does not track or collect any data about you. Version %1s Build %2d Database version %3d Crashreport ID: %4s © Daniel Wolf 2019 Licensed under GPLv3. support@frostnerd.com
Hey, I found this app which encrypts your DNS queries to give you more privacy and security. Check it out here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.frostnerd.smokescreen
The lower the values, the faster Nebulo is able to communicate with the server. This for example increases your browsing speed.
You don\'t have any app installed to view this link
There already is a rule for this host
Define all your custom hosts here
Rules from this source: %1d (%2d duplicates not in use)
Search for a host in the query log
Create DNS rule for this host
Private DNS is active, your queries are already protected. Enable Nebulo if you wish to use DNS-over-HTTPS or other useful features.\nTo enable Nebulo disable Private DNS.
Restart the app for changes to take effect.
Congratulations, iptables is supported by your device!
Iptables is supported, but IPv6 is not supported.
Your device does not support iptables
Refresh to import rules from source
The server %1s seems to be unstable right now.
The server %1s seems to be unstable right now, impacting your browsing speed. Consider switching to a more stable server.
Nebulo is an app to protect your privacy and secure your device.\n\nTake back control of data your ISP or other entities have treated as theirs for a long time.
By adding encryption to DNS, one of the oldest protocol of the Internet, it is in your hands.\n\nMake it harder for your ISP to track you by using DNS-over-HTTPS and DNS-over-TLS with Nebulo.

Nebulo comes bundled with a ton of useful features like monitoring DNS activity, PIN protection, a speed test and much more.\n\nExplore the app to discover what free open-source software has to offer.
You can configure Nebulo to be used as a system-wide ad- and tracking-blocker.\n\nYou are even able to use it together with some firewall apps to increase your control over your privacy even more.
Which kind of server do you want to use in Nebulo?
There are servers which fit multiple or even all categories. Nebulo automatically chooses the fastest one.
A fast server, with a focus on privacy
A server which protects me from harmful websites and apps
A server which blocks ads and tracking
